RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 250 Y Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LONESTAR RUNNER all out. TF CLASSY LIL JESS second best. FIVE STAR CHICK broke out, dueled thru out. EYING MISS DEB dueled all the way. JESS A FANCY ROSE broke in sharply. BAR FIGHT BLUES bumped both sides. FAVORITE FIRST LADY squeezed start.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 870 Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 20000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREAKIN PATRIOT DASH inside turn, three wide late run. JESSCHEERFORBLUE four wide rally. LAFITTE speed, weakened. SWEATER TLC dueled turn, out kicked. JESS RAY RAY widest of all. PATRIOT MOUNTAIN dueled turn, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Freakin Patriot Dash
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside turn, three wide late run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 440 Y Dirt CR: 80. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $7,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHANGING THE GAME speed, determined. SIR WILLIAM TERRY hard fought loss. TOASTA PATRIOT CHICK chased top two. HESA CRAZY STORM never involved.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 250 Y Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 11700. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GLAMOUR DYNASTY broke out, best. CORONA FOR GOLD late kick. AJS FAST CORONA strong effort. MP FLY HIGH steady try. FAST I AM lost contact.

ENTRY.NAME: Glamour Dynasty
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Leonel and Menchaca Hector J

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Downs Futurity - Grade2 LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 300 Y Dirt CR: 87. Futurity Purse 339046. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE QUALIFIED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO THE 2023 LOUISIANA DOWNS OPEN FUTURITY. Weight: 124 lbs. Trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Negative Hair Test required to enter finals.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHENDO fired, fast. DOLLAR BILL hooked tuffy. WHIRLAWAY PARTY late surge for third, vanned off. SAN LORENZITA fought gamely. WOOPAA123 drift in, strong effort. KAS DELIVERS GL out kicked. HARDTOTEMPT fractious gate, fought hard. CARTELJESS PYW steady effort. HOCK TREE SPECIAL in tight mid way. STABBY JOE asked w/o response.

ENTRY.NAME: Carteljess Pyw
ENTRY.OWNER: Sierra Jose and Gomez Karla Diaz

ENTRY.NAME: Whirlaway Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: late surge for third, vanned off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 300 Y Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 20000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED TWO YEAR OLDS. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HELL OF A VIEW steady drive for win. TTTGOLDEN CUP late run. CANTCONTAINTHEPOWER broke out, erratic. VENUS TLC off slow. JRS MAJESTIC ANGEL one paced. OLE GRAND WEB lost path early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Mardi Gras Futurity - Grade2 LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 300 Y Dirt CR: 89. Futurity Purse 365080. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE QUALIFIED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO THIS FINAL. Weight: 124 lbs. Trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Negative Hair Test required to enter race.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAN LORENZO BLOOD zoomed away. EYESA JUST PRETTY winner to tuff. HIJACK A TRAIN dueled, missed second. ONE SWEET SUGAR drifted in, closed well. JRS MAJESTIC POP POP dueled, out kicked. HOZTILE TAKEOVER steady drive. APOLLITICAL FORCE steadied early. WILD TOPSHELF HERO no late kick. HEYLEMMECALLYOUBACK raced greenly. MP SHEZA YES broke out, erratic.

ENTRY.NAME: Hoztile Takeover
ENTRY.OWNER: Kretschmer Mackenzie and Castellanos Luis Armando
